page.title: 09HOME LIFE(A child's day 1)
page.content: 7.00 am my Dad usually leaves the house for work.He is an architect although he works with the Foreign Office.7.30 am I wake up my brothers. Before breakfast I pack my sailing bag with my wet suit,water-proofs,buoyancy aid and a change of clothes incase I fall in the water.At breakfast I have Grape Nuts if I can find any,and a boiled egg.After I have cleaned my teeth,I feed my rabbit,and get in the car for school. When I am dropped off at school my mum goes to Sussex University to work with blood and unusual diseases.8.55 am bell goes and everyone starts to walk in.We take off our coats and hang them up with our bags. Until assembly we read. I am reading a book "In The Grip of Winter " by Colin Dann.In assembly we sing a song and are read a short story.
